Text: i wish the video transfer was better.
agreed, its supposed to have that 'fuzzy' look to it.  If they spent the time to make the digital transfer perfect, it would of just looked weird
well i completely disagree. as does this review http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/A-Christmas-Story-Blu-ray-Review/1152/

I read the article Johnny and I do agree with you, what's the point of remastering a movie if not to make it better and with less artifacts both towards sound and video?

Anyways, thx for the upload mate!

Best regards,

Dee
